mapper.select:
select count(1) from ( select domain_name as domainName, sum(parse_total_cnt) as parseTotalCnt,sum(parse_success_cnt) as parseSuccessCnt, sum(net_out_parse_total_cnt) as netOutParseTotalCnt,sum(net_in_parse_total_cnt) as netInParseTotalCnt, sum(parse_fail_cnt) as parseFailCnt,sum(within_parse_total_cnt) as withinParseTotalCnt,sum(without_parse_total_cnt) as withoutParseTotalCnt, sum(cdn_parse_total_cnt) as cdnParseTotalCnt,sum(idc_parse_total_cnt) as idcParseTotalCnt,count(DISTINCT whole_domain_name) as domainNameCnt, sum(zgdx_cnt) as zgdxCnt,sum(zglt_cnt) as zgltCnt,sum(gat_cnt) as gatCnt,sum(out_country_cnt) as outCountryCnt,sum(unknown_cnt) as unknownCnt from ${queryTable} 1=1
group by domain_name )

select domain_name as domainName, sum(parse_total_cnt) as parseTotalCnt,sum(parse_success_cnt) as parseSuccessCnt, sum(net_out_parse_total_cnt) as netOutParseTotalCnt,sum(net_in_parse_total_cnt) as netInParseTotalCnt, sum(parse_fail_cnt) as parseFailCnt, sum(cdn_parse_total_cnt) as cdnParseTotalCnt, sum(idc_parse_total_cnt) as idcParseTotalCnt,count(DISTINCT whole_domain_name) as domainNameCnt, sum(zgdx_cnt) as zgdxCnt,sum(zglt_cnt) as zgltCnt,sum(gat_cnt) as gatCnt,sum(out_country_cnt) as outCountryCnt,sum(unknown_cnt) as unknownCnt from ${queryTable} 1=1
group by domain_name order by parseTotalCnt desc limit #{queryParam.offset}, #{queryParam.limit}
